channel.title: Boroughs on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Boroughs on MillMint

item.title: Bakur
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Bakur ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei By the sea, sea, sea, you’ll find a boy, boy, boy, and his heart, heart, heart, lies with his boat, boat, boat.

item.title: Eyri
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Eyri ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei In Eyri, the bones of an ancient beast warp and groan in the sun, red skin glinting in the whitecap churn of the shallows, oxidising, broken, ripped open by the sea.

item.title: Holsyim
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Holsyim ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei These are not particularly adventurous expeditions — most of her work is performed along old trails and paths, but Bea finds the sublime amidst the mundane and has contributed enormously to the ecological understanding of local flora in the borough of Holsyim, where she was born.

item.title: Kyala
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Kyala ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei Many townsfolk in Ou are employed in operation of the dam, either through the Thunder or Hydroburos.

item.title: Lita
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Lita ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei The Royal Borough of Lita was not far from Copette, one of the Five Crown Boroughs of Vekllei, but this was Vekllei’s glacial interior and it felt a million miles from anywhere.

item.title: Lo
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Lo ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei Out in Voya Voya, the gardens light the people, and distill turbulent human temperament into momentary, sequential lyrical images.

item.title: Mirah
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Mirah ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei Gigayeh had beautiful empty beaches, littered with icebergs that caught the light like jewels, but Tzipora couldn’t swim and the water was freezing.

item.title: Miyatvousi
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Miyatvousi ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei There is a so-called “flash plant” in Miyatvousi, in the Lava region of Vekllei […] the earth here is alive; in the cold, the ponds begin to steam.

item.title: Mumen
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Mumen ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei The main beach in Mumen, the nicest of the seaside districts, is constructed out of sand imported from the dunes of Africa.

item.title: Ou

item.title: Santes
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Santes ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei Shattered fjords make up the north of Vekllei, particularly in boroughs like Santes, which are well-regarded for their striking cliffs and sloping igneous fingers, which evidence Vekllei’s ongoing volcanism.

item.title: Stochi
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Stochi ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei The Royal Borough of Lita was not far from Copette ( map of Vekllei here), one of the Five Crown Boroughs of Vekllei, but this was Vekllei’s glacial interior and it felt a million miles from anywhere.

item.title: Troll
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Troll ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei The human royals may be long dead, but Vekllei’s flowering petticoat society retains a monarch — the literal physical presence of the land.

item.title: Yana
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-green); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-green); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a:visited { color: var(--color-green); } .markdown a.book-btn { color: var(--color-green); border: 1px solid var(--color-green); float: right; } The Borough of Yana ← LANDSCAPE Borough Back to Boroughs ߷ This article is about a borough of Vekllei She never claimed to be like the boys at Yana, because she wasn’t.
